span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 智者： persons who claim to be unusually enlightened
【近】 clerisy, intellectual, intelligentsia, literati
【反】 fool, dolt, dullard, idiot, simpleton 傻子

【考法 2】 n. 精英： individuals carefully selected as being the best of a class
【例】 a book launching party to which only New York's cultural illuminati were invited 一个只邀请了纽约上层文化精英的新书发布会
【近】 aristocracy, elite, upper crust
